items.value: A conflict is brewing between (%@kingdom%) and (%@kingdom%). It started (%randomcause%).
(%@king%), who dislikes (%@king%), sent (%@envoy%) to further escalate the conflict.
(%@envoy%) was able to resolve the conflict peacefully.
(%@envoy%) was unable to resolve the conflict.
(%@envoy%) was unable to resolve the conflict because (*_he/she_-0-*) died during the mission.
(%@envoy%) was able to further escalate the conflict.
(%@envoy%) was unable to further escalate the conflict.
(%@envoy%) was unable to further escalate the conflict because (*_he/she_-0-*) died during the mission.
The conflict escalated completely, causing damage to the relationship between (%@kingdom%) and (%@kingdom%).
